gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 124, Magic 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Magic, 124-115. Brandon Miller led the way for the Hornets with 32 points (11-13 FG, 5-6 3PT FG) and six rebounds, while Miles Bridges added 23 points, six rebounds and four assists in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 32 points, eight rebounds and eight assists for the Magic in the losing effort, his 11th 30+ point game of the season. The Hornets improve to 19-58 on the season, while the Magic fall to 45-32.
